name: Gorf
overview: The Evil Gorfian Robot Empire has attacked. Your assignment is to repel the invasion and launch a confrontation. You will engage various hostile space craft as you journey towards a dramatic confrontation with the enemy flagship. This Gorf remake was created by Kevin Gallagher several versions were released over time, primarily in 1993. One version of the game is available on the 2nd coverdisk of Amiga Action 67.
